name: Trap World (Berker Games)
description:
TRAP WORLD

     Play as superhero Sharlo who has to overcome traps and defeat enemies to find and rescue his pregnant wife Kate. Jump and smash enemies through exciting levels and discover breathtaking places with lots of hidden traps and collectibles.     "Trap World" is a legendary platformer, with nearly 300 unique traps and enemies! Bearded turtles, angry bees, sticky slimes, spikey monsters, magician doormen, fast swordsmen, stupid archers, mighty Zeus, evil Hades, and even more! So, get in on the adventure!     Solve puzzles... Be quick and smart... and help the superhero find his wife who was kidnapped by Red Dragon. Battle in a range of awesomely well-designed levels, and rescue the mother of your child from monsters!      Avoid any traps! Jump on monster heads and smash them! Our superhero's special ability is that he can jump in the mid-air. The superhero is very easy to control with the action buttons. You can jump anywhere at any time with the jump button. Hold the button for the higher jumps! Amazing Features ⭐ One of the hardest trap adventure games of 2021. ⭐ Fabulous pixel-art animations and in-game graphics ⭐ Impressive story ⭐ Fun voice acting and cutscenes ⭐ 2 different worlds ⭐ 3 challenging boss fight ⭐ 16 well-designed levels ⭐ Game Services with tricky achievements and awesome leaderboards ⭐ Extremely fun and addicting. ⭐ Download for free and enjoy your Trap Adventure!   STORY     On a beautiful day, Kate and our superhero were walking in the forest. Unfortunately, a Red Dragon kidnapped Kate while she is pregnant. Our desperate superhero has to go after the dragon and avoid the traps to save the love of his life. In this trap adventure world, can you find the love of your life and save her from the Red Dragon? P.S. We made the Trap World a challenging platform game for those who love tough trap adventure games and good old arcade games. 🦸 Trap World 🔥     Run faster, be smart, defeat monsters, and find your love 🔥 Berker Games 2022
